content: And while it's small, I believe we could get to about $10 million in customer new customer dollars in just the first month, and I believe in a couple of quarters, the digital bank will be one of our largest branches. Non-interest expense included a number of items this quarter, including $308,000 in branch closure costs of $311,000 expense for unfunded commitment reserve and a full quarter of mortgage expenses, which included the build-out of origination teams, as Dennis discussed previously.
